content:
Spilling family

1 Elias SPILLING                     1769 {census family 561}
 + Cywie                             1771 (Moses)
  2x Jacob Bunem SPILLING            1791 - 1847 #636
    + Rachel SCHUCHART               1797 - Mar 21, 1877 #124
          married Jun 17, 1818 #23
     3o Elle Szondel SPILLING        1820 #71 - before/after 1890
       * Hirsch LADNER               1814-17 Krakow - after 1890
             married Dec 26, 1881 #79
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Mozes Herschel SPILLING      1822 #379 - 1822 #268
     3o Rachel SPILLING              1823 #459 - 1847 #639
     3x Hirsz Beirel SPILLING        1826 #147 - 1826 #85
     3o Ester Chawe SPILLING         1827 #281
     3o daughter SPILLING            1830 #188 - 1830 #146
     3x Moyzesz Eliasz SPILLING      1831 #304 - 1832 #289
     3x Hersch Leib SPILLING         1833 #282
       + Rywka Lea SCHAUMAN          Dec 12, 1836 (1837 #20)
        4o Sara SPILLING             Jun 19, 1862 (1863 #90)
          * unknown
           5x Feiwel SPILING         Jun 24, 1895 #443
           5o Feigel SPILING         Mar 25, 1900 #219
        4o Ciwie (Sofia) SPIELING    Nov 12, 1866 (1867 #533) - Jul 9, 1871 #201
        4x Saul SPILING              1868 (1869 #26) - Oct 29, 1874 #553
        4o Chaje Reisel SPILLING     1872 #374
        4x Izrael SPILING            Jul 10, 1877 #461
     3o Cywie SPILLING               1836 #241 - 1847 #630 (?1847 #656)
     3x son SPILLING                 - 1838 #118
     3o Hinda Itel SPILLING          May 19, 1840 #239
       * Jakob SELZER                Apr 5, 1838 #140
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Abraham Eliasz SPILLING      1842 #442
    ?? + unknown 
    ??  4x Maier SPILING             Jul 28, 1871 - Aug 8, 1871 #241
     3x son SPILLING                 Jan 26, 1845 #38 - 1845 #16
